name: Secret historical spousicide
description: Woman has a secret history of murdering spouses (hers or someone else's).

name: Grass ain't greener
description: Character abandons wholesome/safe love to pursue dangerous/corrupt love.

name: Money mendacity spiral
description: Quickly compounding/accumulating issues stemming from monetary dishonesty.

name: Murder on rails
description: Murder occurring (or seeming to occur) on or near a train.

name: Eve tempts Adam
description: Woman cajoles man into doing an evil deed for her (usually murder).

name: Boarding house blues
description: Issues with living in a boarding house, such as dangerous residents or intrusive landlords.
